product_name: D-Bronzi™ Bronzing Drops with Peptides
product_description: What it is: This antioxidant-rich, peptide-infused serum delivers a bronzy wash of color while boosting skin’s elasticity and supporting healthy barrier function. Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness Formulation: Lightweight Liquid Highlighted Ingredients: -Cocoa Extract: Provides powerful antioxidant and soothing benefits. -Matrixyl 3000 Peptide Blend: Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while promoting elasticity and resilience. -Chronocyclin: This chronopeptide mimics the antioxidant benefits of vitamin D. Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free. What Else You Need to Know: With a chronopeptide that mimics vitamin D’s antioxidant benefits, D-Bronzi flatters every complexion—without the sun damage. Like our other color serum drops O-Bloos and B-Goldi, D-Bronzi is designed to be mixed with any Drunk Elephant moisturizer or serum to add the prettiest hint of color. This serum is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state. Drunk Elephant skincare is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants. Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Pores, and Dullness Highlighted Ingredients: - Lactic Acid 9% (AHA): Exfoliates skin's surface to reveal visibly smoother, brighter, more glowing skin. - Gluconolactone (PHA): Gently exfoliates to visiblyeven tone and improve clarity of blemish-prone skin. - Soothing Complex (Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe, Green Tea): Soothes and replenishes overnight to keep skin calm, hydrated, and supple. Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and gluten-free. What Else You Need to Know: This serum delivers exfoliating AHAs and PHAs to visibly brighten dull skin, retexturize, and refine the look of pores. The potent actives are balanced with a soothing complex of hyaluronic acid, antioxidants, and aloe vera to nourish and replenish overnight. This serum is also fragrance-free. This product is an Allure Best of Beauty award winner. Clinical Results: In a four-week clinical study done with 35 subjects, ages 23-75: - 100% said their skin looks brighter and more glowy overnight - 100% experienced less noticeable pores - 96% said their skin felt smoother

product_name: A-Passioni™ Retinol Cream
product_description: What it is: A clean, cutting-edge formula with 1.0% vegan retinol and superfood-rich ingredients to diminish the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and sun damage. Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness Formulation: Cream Highlighted Ingredients: - 1.0% Retinol: Improves the look and feel of uneven skin tone and texture while warding off damage. - Triple-Peptide Blend: Helps visibly firm and strengthen, boosting the age-fighting benefits of retinol. - Vitamin F: Fatty acids work to improve the look of texture and suppleness and help calm skin. Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging. What Else You Need to Know: Retinol and supportive peptides visibly restore bounce, resilience, and clarity to skin while helping to even tone and texture without redness and irritation. Vitamin F and a curated blend of oils replenish lipids and moisture while antioxidant-packed ingredients help defend against environmental stressors. It’s also free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—that’s what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state. Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free. Clinical Results: In a clinical study with 31 people after 8 weeks: - 100% showed improvement in firmness and elasticity - 96% showed reduced lines and wrinkles - 93% showed improvement in texture CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.

What Else You Need to Know: Designed for both new and experienced retinol users, A-Gloei™ was created with all skin in mind. Retinol gets a bad rap for being sensitizing, but A- Gloei™ is formulated with soothing marula oil and ceramides to gently deliver retinol to skin, ensuring high efficacy without redness or irritation. Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state. Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free. Free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, irritants, and PEGs. Clinical Results: In a consumer-perception study with 35 people after 8 weeks: - 97% agreed skin’s hydration and moisture was improved - 85% agreed skin’s firmness and elasticity was improved - 85% agreed A-Gloei restored bounce, resilience, and brighter clarity CLEAN at Sephora is our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
